alert.note: Alert for Imperial County Southeast; Imperial County Southwest; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 08 at 2:11PM PDT until September 09 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Imperial County including the city of El Centro. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Imperial County Southeast; Imperial County Southwest; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Salton Sea
